<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cobra Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5990) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=701" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You enter a tightly coiled stance, with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 piercing damage; are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=570), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=602), [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719), and [venomous](/Traits.aspx?ID=785) traits.

 While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

<title level="2">Cobra Stance leads to...</title>
[Cobra Envenom](/Feats.aspx?ID=6018)
name: Cobra Stance
